Recipe.Name: Content
Recipe.Description: Sets up content types and content used on the Moov2 Website.
Recipe.Author: Moov2

ContentMenuItem.Description: Adds a Content Item to the menu.

HtmlMenuItem.Description: Renders some custom HTML in the menu.

AdminMenuPart.ContentPartSettings.Description: Adds a menu item to the Admin menu that links to this content item.

AutoroutePart.ContentPartSettings.Description: Adds advanced url configuration options to your content type to completely customize the url pattern for a content item.

BodyPart.ContentPartSettings.Description: Allows the editing of text using an editor provided by the configured flavor (e.g. html, text, markdown).

CommonPart.ContentPartSettings.Description: Provides common information about a content item, such as Owner, Date Created, Date Published and Date Modified.

InvertedHeader.BooleanField.BooleanFieldSettings.Hint: Switch the header to white version.

IdentityPart.ContentPartSettings.Description: Automatically generates a unique identity for the content item, which is required in import/export scenarios where one content item references another.

ImagePart.ContentPartSettings.Description: Provides common metadata for an Image Media.

LayoutPart.ContentPartSettings.Description: Adds a layout designer to your content type.

MediaPart.ContentPartSettings.Description: Turns a content type into a Media. Note: you need to set the stereotype to "Media" as well.

MenuPart.ContentPartSettings.Description: Provides an easy way to create a ContentMenuItem from the content editor.

OEmbedPart.ContentPartSettings.Description: Provides common metadata for an OEmbed Media.

InvertedHeader.BooleanField.BooleanFieldSettings.Hint: Switch the header to white version.
Switch the header to white version.

Summary.TextField.TextFieldSettings.Hint: This text is used when post is displayed in a list of posts.

TitlePart.ContentPartSettings.Description: Provides a Title for your content item.

VideoPart.ContentPartSettings.Description: Provides common metadata for a Video Media.

WidgetPart.ContentPartSettings.Description: Turns a content type into a Widget. Note: you need to set the stereotype to "Widget" as well.

TextField.Summary.Text: Moov2 took part in the BIMA Digital Day 2016 at Itchen College, to see what the next generation hold.
On Saturday 21st March 2015, over 80 developers settled in to Microsoft's Cardinal Place offices for a 36 hour hackathon focusing on the Kinect for Windows v2 sensor.

margin--bottom-gigantic@medium","htmlStyle":"","rule":""},{"typeName":"Moov2.Website.Elements.Elements.Section","data":"","exportableData":"","index":2,"elements":[{"typeName":"Orchard.Layouts.Elements.Html","data":"Content=%3ch2%3eWhat+was+it%3f%3c%2fh2%3e%0d%0a%3cp%3eOn+Saturday+21st+March+2015%2c+over+80+developers+settled+in+to+Microsoft%27s+Cardinal+Place+offices+for+a+36+hour+hackathon+focusing+on+the+Kinect+for+Windows+v2+sensor.+The+event%2c+organised+by+Moov2+with+support+from+Microsoft%27s+developer+experience+team%2c+was+a+roaring+success+full+of+fun%2c+enthusiasm+and+resulting+in+some+fantastic+projects.%3c%2fp%3e","exportableData":"","index":0,"elements":[],"isTemplated":false,"htmlId":"","htmlClass":"","htmlStyle":"","rule":""}],"isTemplated":false,"htmlId":"","htmlClass":"margin--bottom-gigantic","htmlStyle":"","rule":""},{"typeName":"Moov2.Website.Elements.Elements.Section","data":"","exportableData":"","index":3,"elements":[{"typeName":"Orchard.Layouts.Elements.Html","data":"Content=%3ch2%3eWhat+happened%3f%3c%2fh2%3e%0d%0a%3cp%3eAttendees+who+had+travelled+from+Scotland%2c+France%2c+Germany%2c+the+Netherlands+and+even+as+far+as+Mexico+arrived+early+for+registration+where+they+received+their+lanyards+and+Kinecthack+London+t-shirt.%3c%2fp%3e","exportableData":"","index":0,"elements":[],"isTemplated":false,"htmlId":"","htmlClass":"","htmlStyle":"","rule":""}],"isTemplated":false,"htmlId":"","htmlClass":"margin--bottom-gigantic","htmlStyle":"","rule":""},{"typeName":"Moov2.Website.Elements.Elements.Section","data":"","exportableData":"","index":4,"elements":[{"typeName":"Orchard.Layouts.Elements.Html","data":"Content=%3cul+class%3d%22list+flex+flex--direction-column+flex--direction-row%40medium+flex--wrap+double%40medium%22%3e%0d%0a%3cli+class%3d%22list__item+padding--horizontal-large%40large+margin--bottom-large%22%3e%3cimg+alt%3d%22%22+src%3d%22https%3a%2f%2fmoov2websitedev.azureedge.net%2fmedia%2fDefault%2fArticles%2fkinect_hack_1.jpg%22+%2f%3e%0d%0a%3cp+class%3d%22padding--horizontal-none%22%3eThey+were+then+snapped+by+our+retro+polaroid+cameras+as+a+collage+of+attendees+and+projects+was+formed+whilst+everyone+settled+in+and+got+to+know+each+other.%3c%2fp%3e%0d%0a%3c%2fli%3e%0d%0a%3cli+class%3d%22list__item+padding--horizontal-large%40large+margin--bottom-large%22%3e%3cimg+alt%3d%22%22+src%3d%22https%3a%2f%2fmoov2websitedev.azureedge.net%2fmedia%2fDefault%2fArticles%2fkinect_hack_2.jpg%22+%2f%3e%0d%0a%3cp+class%3d%22padding--horizontal-none%22%3eThe+event+kicked+off+with+an+introduction+from+Dan+of+Moov2+welcoming+everyone+to+the+event.%3c%2fp%3e%0d%0a%3c%2fli%3e%0d%0a%3cli+class%3d%22list__item+padding--horizontal-large%40large+margin--bottom-large%22%3e%3cimg+alt%3d%22%22+src%3d%22https%3a%2f%2fmoov2websitedev.azureedge.net%2fmedia%2fDefault%2fArticles%2fkinect_hack_3.jpg%22+%2f%3e%0d%0a%3cp+class%3d%22padding--horizontal-none%22%3eImmediately+after+Microsoft%27s+Pete+Daukintis+hosted+an+extremely+popular+%22getting+started%22+workshop+which+walked+through+the+make-up+of+a+Kinect+for+Windows+project+which+enabled+everyone+to+get+up+and+running.%3c%2fp%3e%0d%0a%3c%2fli%3e%0d%0a%3cli+class%3d%22list__item+padding--horizontal-large%40large+margin--bottom-large%22%3e%3cimg+alt%3d%22%22+src%3d%22https%3a%2f%2fmoov2websitedev.azureedge.net%2fmedia%2fDefault%2fArticles%2fkinect_hack_4.jpg%22+%2f%3e%0d%0a%3cp+class%3d%22padding--horizontal-none%22%3eSoon+after+the+workshop%2c+everyone+took+residence+in+the+auditorium+where+they+would+be+for+the+rest+of+the+weekend+and+work+commenced+on+various+projects.%3c%2fp%3e%0d%0a%3c%2fli%3e%0d%0a%3c%2ful%3e","exportableData":"","index":0,"elements":[],"isTemplated":false,"htmlId":"","htmlClass":"","htmlStyle":"","rule":""}],"isTemplated":false,"htmlId":"","htmlClass":"section--xx-wide","htmlStyle":"","rule":""},{"typeName":"Orchard.Layouts.Elements.Break","data":"","exportableData":"","index":5,"elements":[],"isTemplated":false,"htmlId":"","htmlClass":"hr--spacer-short hr--transparent","htmlStyle":"","rule":""},{"typeName":"Moov2.Website.Elements.Elements.Section","data":"","exportableData":"","index":6,"elements":[{"typeName":"Orchard.Layouts.Elements.Heading","data":"Content=Food&Level=2","exportableData":"","index":0,"elements":[],"isTemplated":false,"htmlId":"","htmlClass":"","htmlStyle":"","rule":""},{"typeName":"Orchard.Layouts.Elements.Html","data":"Content=%3cp%3e%3cspan%3eTypical+hackday+fayre+wasn%27t+going+to+cut+it%2c+an+event+as+special+as+Kinecthack+London+deserved+some+special+fuel+for+the+attendees+so+Moov2+arranged+for+meals+to+be+provided+by+various+London+street+food+vendors.+Throughout+the+weekend+we+had+Cheeky+Indian+who+served+extremely+delicious+Indian+themed+wraps+including+%22chicken+tickle%22+(tikka)+and+the+very+popular+spicy+meatballs.+We+also+had+The+Mac+Factory+serving+gourmet+Mac+n+Cheese+and+Cheeky+Burger+who+delivered+the+most+amazing+freshly+prepared+burgers.+Needless+to+say+no+one+went+hungry+and+feedback+was+extremely+positive.%3c%2fspan%3e%3c%2fp%3e","exportableData":"","index":1,"elements":[],"isTemplated":false,"htmlId":"","htmlClass":"margin--bottom-gigantic","htmlStyle":"","rule":""}],"isTemplated":false,"htmlId":"","htmlClass":"","htmlStyle":"","rule":""},{"typeName":"Moov2.Website.Elements.Elements.Section","data":"","exportableData":"","index":7,"elements":[{"typeName":"Orchard.Layouts.Elements.Html","data":"Content=%3cul+class%3d%22list+flex+flex--direction-column+flex--direction-row%40medium+flex--wrap+double%40medium%22%3e%0d%0a%3cli+class%3d%22list__item+padding--horizontal-large%40large+margin--bottom-large%22%3e%3cimg+alt%3d%22%22+src%3d%22https%3a%2f%2fmoov2websitedev.azureedge.net%2fmedia%2fDefault%2fArticles%2fkinect_hack_5.jpg%22+%2f%3e%0d%0a%3cp+class%3d%22padding--horizontal-none%22%3eGourmet+Mac+n%27+Cheese+courtesy+of+%3ca+href%3d%22https%3a%2f%2ftwitter.com%2fthemacfac%22%3eThe+Mac+Factory%3c%2fa%3e.%3c%2fp%3e%0d%0a%3c%2fli%3e%0d%0a%3cli+class%3d%22list__item+padding--horizontal-large%40large+margin--bottom-large%22%3e%3cimg+alt%3d%22%22+src%3d%22https%3a%2f%2fmoov2websitedev.azureedge.net%2fmedia%2fDefault%2fArticles%2fkinect_hack_6.jpg%22+%2f%3e%0d%0a%3cp+class%3d%22padding--horizontal-none%22%3eDelicious+meals+also+provided+by+%3ca+href%3d%22https%3a%2f%2ftwitter.com%2fthecheekyindian%22%3eThe+Cheeky+Indian%3c%2fa%3e+and+%3ca+href%3d%22https%3a%2f%2ftwitter.com%2fcheeky_burger%22%3eCheeky+Burger%3c%2fa%3e.%3c%2fp%3e%0d%0a%3c%2fli%3e%0d%0a%3c%2ful%3e","exportableData":"","index":0,"elements":[],"isTemplated":false,"htmlId":"","htmlClass":"","htmlStyle":"","rule":""}],"isTemplated":false,"htmlId":null,"htmlClass":"section--xx-wide","htmlStyle":null,"rule":null},{"typeName":"Orchard.Layouts.Elements.Break","data":"","exportableData":"","index":8,"elements":[],"isTemplated":false,"htmlId":"","htmlClass":"hr--spacer-short hr--transparent","htmlStyle":"","rule":""},{"typeName":"Moov2.Website.Elements.Elements.Section","data":"","exportableData":"","index":9,"elements":[{"typeName":"Orchard.Layouts.Elements.Html","data":"Content=%3ch2%3eThe+projects%3c%2fh2%3e%0d%0a%3cp%3eAs+well+as+fun+and+food%2c+a+lot+of+incredible+projects+were+also+created+during+Kinecthack+London.+Check+out+the+following+videos+for+a+taste+of+what+our+attendees+were+working+on%3a%3c%2fp%3e%0d%0a%3cp%3eFull+list+of+projects+presented+during+show-n-tell%3a%3c%2fp%3e%0d%0a%3cul%3e%0d%0a%3cli%3ePong+in+Kinect+-+variation+of+the+classic+game+pong+controlled+by+either+Squats+or+Press+ups%3c%2fli%3e%0d%0a%3cli%3eSphero+Slalom+-+Kinect+controlled+Sphero+device%2c+a+remote+controllable+ball.%3c%2fli%3e%0d%0a%3cli%3eFlight+of+light+-+4+Player+Unity+game+which+was+adapted+to+support+Kinect+input%3c%2fli%3e%0d%0a%3cli%3eJames+Aliban%27s+Vase+maker+-+Through+the+use+of+the+Kinect+camera+and+Ppen+Frameworks+James+created+a+host+of+weird+and+wonderful+psychedelic+3D+vase+visualisations%3c%2fli%3e%0d%0a%3cli%3eSquat+analyser+-+exercise+form+analyser%3c%2fli%3e%0d%0a%3cli%3eSkelexplore+-+skeleton+and+muscle+explorer%3c%2fli%3e%0d%0a%3cli%3eDo+it+for+Walt+-+Disney+devs+prototyping+interactive+theme+park+guide+with+funny+mask+%2b+gloves+picture+sharing%3c%2fli%3e%0d%0a%3cli%3eKinect+%2b+Occulus+-+Tom+Bonner+worked+tirelessly+to+add+extra+immersion+to+an+Occulus+VR+experience+by+adding+limbs+via+Kinect+data%3c%2fli%3e%0d%0a%3cli%3eFlappy+Box+-+4+player%2c+flappy+bird+clone+with+kinect+powered+jump-to-flap!+Hilarious+and+exhausting.%3c%2fli%3e%0d%0a%3cli%3eMusic+Machine+-+Interactive+music+making+where+body+position+controls+the+audio%3c%2fli%3e%0d%0a%3cli%3eSkynect+-+Kinect+to+Skype+camera+integration%3c%2fli%3e%0d%0a%3cli%3eKinect+Graphics+-+Experiments+in+Kinect+powered+graphics+visualisations%3c%2fli%3e%0d%0a%3cli%3eKinect+talks+-+Fernando+used+Kinect+to+create+a+tool+to+assist+a+5+year+old+sufferer+of+cerebral+palsy+utilising+simple+body+movements+to+voice+outputs%3c%2fli%3e%0d%0a%3cli%3eHole+in+the+wall+-+Unity+game+using+Kinect+gestures+to+push+shaped+blocks+into+a+3D+advancing+wall%3c%2fli%3e%0d%0a%3cli%3eBox+sizer+-+Kinect+camera+and+depth+detection+to+measure+cardboard+box+sizes+for+a+logistics+company%3c%2fli%3e%0d%0a%3cli%3eMulti-kinect+server+-+Sending+compressed+Kinect+sensor+data+over+TCP+to+solve+the+sensor+proximity+challenge%2c+also+merging+of+multiple+Kinect+sensors+to+offer+full+360+point+cloud+data%3c%2fli%3e%0d%0a%3cli%3eBubblecatch+-+WPF+powered+multiplayer+game+where+players+have+to+catch+bubbles+and+avoid+explosives%3c%2fli%3e%0d%0a%3cli%3eKinect+Juggling+-+Using+Kinect+sensor+data+to+identify+a+thrown+ball+in+a+juggling+context+to+analyse+path+and+accuracy+of+juggler.+Impressive+tech+and+great+potential+for+a+juggling+learning+tool.%3c%2fli%3e%0d%0a%3cli%3eKinect+Kombat+-+Prototype+first+person+beat-em-up%2c+throw+fireballs!%3c%2fli%3e%0d%0a%3cli%3eHelicar+%26amp%3b+Lewis+-+Placing+3D+characters+in+a+modelled+3D+world%2c+to+be+taken+on+the+road+to+enable+children+to+visualise+their+imagined+environments%3c%2fli%3e%0d%0a%3cli%3eKinect+Shooter+-+Kinect+enabled+gun+weilding+shoot+em+up%3c%2fli%3e%0d%0a%3cli%3e3D+Fuser+-+Mapping+kinect+sensor+camera+data+to+3D+models%3c%2fli%3e%0d%0a%3c%2ful%3e","exportableData":"","index":0,"elements":[],"isTemplated":false,"htmlId":"","htmlClass":"","htmlStyle":"","rule":""}],"isTemplated":false,"htmlId":"","htmlClass":"","htmlStyle":"","rule":""},{"typeName":"Orchard.Layouts.Elements.Break","data":"","exportableData":"","index":10,"elements":[],"isTemplated":false,"htmlId":"","htmlClass":"hr--spacer-short hr--transparent","htmlStyle":"","rule":""},{"typeName":"Moov2.Website.Elements.Elements.Section","data":"","exportableData":"","index":11,"elements":[{"typeName":"Orchard.Layouts.Elements.Html","data":"Content=%3ch2%3ePrizes%3c%2fh2%3e%0d%0a%3cp%3eThe+aim+of+Kinecthack+London+was+to+offer+a+fun%2c+productive+environment+where+developers+could+explore+the+capabilities+of+Kinect.+As+such+aggressive+competition+wasn%27t+part+of+the+agenda.+However%2c+we+did+want+to+reward+efforts+so+some+rather+special+prizes+were+arranged+for+participation+and+outstanding+contributions.+Throughout+the+event+we+gave+away+a+load+of+fun+merchandise+including+Azure+jelly+beans%2c+Microsoft+Glow+sticks+and+Xbox+Onesies.+We+gave+out+30+Kinect+sensors+to+willing+participants+of+our+social+media+fun+and+games+(check+out+the+%3ca+href%3d%22https%3a%2f%2ftwitter.com%2fsearch%3fq%3d%2523kinecthacklondon%26amp%3bsrc%3dtypd%22%3e%23kinecthacklondon%3c%2fa%3e+hashtag)+and+raffled+3+raspberry+pi+2%27s%2c+3+raspberry+pi+starter+kits%2c+4+sphero+v2s+(thanks+to+orbotix+for+these!).+finally%2c+our+chosen+top+three+projects+received+a+sphero+ollie+awarded+to+tom+bonner+and+his+occulusvr+%2b+kinect+project%2c+a+parrot+jumping+sumo+awarded+to+and+our+grand+prize+a+parrot+ar+drone+won+by+julien+for+his+incredible+multi-kinect+project.%3c%2fp%3e","exportableData":"","index":0,"elements":[],"isTemplated":false,"htmlId":"","htmlClass":"margin--bottom-gigantic","htmlStyle":"","rule":""}],"isTemplated":false,"htmlId":"","htmlClass":"","htmlStyle":"","rule":""},{"typeName":"Moov2.Website.Elements.Elements.Section","data":"","exportableData":"","index":12,"elements":[{"typeName":"Orchard.Layouts.Elements.Html","data":"Content=%3cdiv+class%3d%22embed+shadow--box-light%22%3e%3ciframe+width%3d%22300%22+height%3d%22150%22+src%3d%22https%3a%2f%2fwww.youtube.com%2fembed%2fgFmThbFmMWE%22+frameborder%3d%220%22+allowfullscreen%3d%22allowfullscreen%22%3e%3c%2fiframe%3e%3c%2fdiv%3e","exportableData":"","index":0,"elements":[],"isTemplated":false,"htmlId":"","htmlClass":"","htmlStyle":"","rule":""}],"isTemplated":false,"htmlId":"","htmlClass":"section--x-wide margin--bottom-large margin--bottom-gigantic@medium","htmlStyle":"","rule":""},{"typeName":"Orchard.Layouts.Elements.Break","data":"","exportableData":"","index":13,"elements":[],"isTemplated":false,"htmlId":"","htmlClass":"hr--spacer-short hr--transparent","htmlStyle":"","rule":""},{"typeName":"Moov2.Website.Elements.Elements.Section","data":"","exportableData":"","index":14,"elements":[{"typeName":"Orchard.Layouts.Elements.Html","data":"Content=%3ch2%3eWhat+next%3f%3c%2fh2%3e%0d%0a%3cp%3eFeedback+from+the+event+has+been+overwhelmingly+positive%2c+everyone+seems+to+have+enjoyed+themselves+and+some+really+fantastic+projects+were+born.+Nothing+is+confirmed+yet+but+we%27re+certainly+keen+to+organise+another+event+so+watch+this+space!%3c%2fp%3e%0d%0a%3cp%3eSome+other%27s+thoughts+on+the+event%3a%3c%2fp%3e%0d%0a%3cul%3e%0d%0a%3cli%3e%3ca+target%3d%22_blank%22+href%3d%22http%3a%2f%2fhannahsuppiah.co.uk%2fevents%2fkinect-hack-london%2f%22%3eKinecthack+london+-+a+designers+perspective%3c%2fa%3e+by+%3ca+target%3d%22_blank%22+href%3d%22http%3a%2f%2fhannahsuppiah.co.uk%2f%22%3eHannah+Suppiah%3c%2fa%3e%3c%2fli%3e%0d%0a%3cli%3e%3ca+target%3d%22_blank%22+href%3d%22http%3a%2f%2fpasupulaphani.github.io%2fSphero-Slalom%2f%22%3eSphero+Slalom+open+sourced%3c%2fa%3e%3c%2fli%3e%0d%0a%3cli%3e%3ca+target%3d%22_blank%22+href%3d%22https%3a%2f%2fwww.facebook.com%2fWestCollegeScotland%2fposts%2f833795336657500%22%3eA+kinect+mvps+perspective%3c%2fa%3e%3c%2fli%3e%0d%0a%3cli%3e%3ca+target%3d%22_blank%22+href%3d%22http%3a%2f%2fsuperserialgames.blogspot.co.uk%2f2015%2f04%2fkinecthack-london.html%3fm%3d1%22%3eA+gamedev+student%27s+perspective%3c%2fa%3e+by+%3ca+target%3d%22_blank%22+href%3d%22http%3a%2f%2fwww.superserialgames.net%2f2015%2f04%2fkinecthack-london.html%3fm%3d1%22%3eScott+Anderson%3c%2fa%3e%3c%2fli%3e%0d%0a%3c%2ful%3e","exportableData":"","index":0,"elements":[],"isTemplated":false,"htmlId":"","htmlClass":"","htmlStyle":"","rule":""}],"isTemplated":false,"htmlId":"","htmlClass":"","htmlStyle":"","rule":""},{"typeName":"Orchard.Layouts.Elements.Break","data":"","exportableData":"","index":15,"elements":[],"isTemplated":false,"htmlId":"","htmlClass":"hr--spacer-short TextField.Summary.Text: After last years amazing Kinecthack London, we’ve teamed up again with the MS Dev Experience team for another amazing event: re:cognition
The first ever Rocket Jump Event took place in Brighton on 24th November, here's a look at what went on.

LayoutPart.LayoutData: margin--bottom-gigantic@medium","htmlStyle":"","rule":""},{"typeName":"Moov2.Website.Elements.Elements.Section","data":"","exportableData":"","index":2,"elements":[{"typeName":"Orchard.Layouts.Elements.Html","data":"Content=%3cp+class%3d%22text--large%22%3e1+host%2c+4+speakers%2c+18+local+showcases+and+over+100+attendees.%3c%2fp%3e%0d%0a%3cp%3eThe+first+ever+Rocket+Jump+Event+took+place+at+Komedia+in+Brighton+on+the+24th+November.+There+were+two+parts+to+the+evening%3a+a+showcase%2c+followed+by+talks+from+established+games+industry+professionals.+The+showcase+provided+the+attending+organisations+with+space+to+show+off+their+latest+projects+and+the+talks+allowed+all+attendees+to+level+up+with+some+expert+knowledge+sharing.%3c%2fp%3e%0d%0a%3cfigure+class%3d%22figure+figure--right+margin--bottom-none%22%3e%3cimg+src%3d%22https%3a%2f%2fmoov2websitedev.azureedge.net%2fmedia%2fDefault%2fEvents%2fRocket%2520Jump%2fjordan-erica-webber.png%22+alt%3d%22Jordan+Erica+Webber%22+%2f%3e+%3cfigcaption%3eJordan+was+a+fantastic+host+and+did+a+great+job+introducing+speakers.%3c%2ffigcaption%3e%3c%2ffigure%3e%0d%0a%3cp%3eOur+host+for+the+evening%2c+%3ca+href%3d%22https%3a%2f%2ftwitter.com%2fjawsew%22%3eJordan+Erica+Webber%3c%2fa%3e%2c+games+journalist+for+the+Guardian%2c+did+a+great+job+of+introducing+the+speakers%2c+keeping+things+on+time+and+the+audience+entertained+throughout+the+evening.%3c%2fp%3e%0d%0a%3cp%3eAnother+feature+of+the+event+was+the+local+showcase+where+we+invited+games+studios+and+other+relevant+businesses+from+the+area+to+come+and+show+off+their+latest+projects.%3c%2fp%3e%0d%0a%3cp%3eView+the+%3ca+href%3d%22http%3a%2f%2frocketjumpevents.com%2fnews%2fbrighton-showcase-the-full-list%22%3efull+Brighton+showcase+listing%3c%2fa%3e.%3c%2fp%3e","exportableData":"","index":0,"elements":[],"isTemplated":false,"htmlId":"","htmlClass":"","htmlStyle":"","rule":""}],"isTemplated":false,"htmlId":"","htmlClass":"","htmlStyle":"","rule":""},{"typeName":"Orchard.Layouts.Elements.Break","data":"","exportableData":"","index":3,"elements":[],"isTemplated":false,"htmlId":"","htmlClass":"hr--spacer-short ucts.%3c%2fp%3e%0d%0a%3c%2fdiv%3e%0d%0a%3c%2fli%3e%0d%0a%3cli+class%3d%22list__item+margin--bottom-large+padding--horizontal-large%40medium%22%3e%0d%0a%3cdiv+class%3d%22embed+margin--bottom-default%22%3e%3ciframe+width%3d%22300%22+height%3d%22150%22+src%3d%22%2f%2fwww.youtube.com%2fembed%2fdJIjrnhQS3o%22+frameborder%3d%220%22+allowfullscreen%3d%22allowfullscreen%22%3e%3c%2fiframe%3e%3c%2fdiv%3e%0d%0a%3cdiv+class%3d%22box%22%3e%0d%0a%3ch3+class%3d%22margin--bottom-small+padding--horizontal-none%40medium%22%3eNarrative+design+for+VR%2fAR%3c%2fh3%3e%0d%0a%3cp+class%3d%22padding--horizontal-none%40medium%22%3eGame+writer+and+narrative+designer+%3ca+href%3d%22https%3a%2f%2ftwitter.com%2fAboutThisLater%22%3eRob+Morgan%3c%2fa%3e+delivered+a+phenomenal+talk+offering+great+insight+into+narrative+considerations+and+their+impact+on+immersion+within+Virtual+Reality+and+Augmented+Reality+experiences.%3c%2fp%3e%0d%0a%3c%2fdiv%3e%0d%0a%3c%2fli%3e%0d%0a%3cli+class%3d%22list__item+margin--bottom-large+padding--horizontal-large%40medium%22%3e%0d%0a%3cdiv+class%3d%22embed+margin--bottom-default%22%3e%3ciframe+width%3d%22300%22+height%3d%22150%22+src%3d%22%2f%2fwww.youtube.com%2fembed%2fkRr7MTfJDUo%22+frameborder%3d%220%22+allowfullscreen%3d%22allowfullscreen%22%3e%3c%2fiframe%3e%3c%2fdiv%3e%0d%0a%3cdiv+class%3d%22box%22%3e%0d%0a%3ch3+class%3d%22margin--bottom-small+padding--horizontal-none%40medium%22%3e8+things+I%27ve+learned...%3c%2fh3%3e%0d%0a%3cp+class%3d%22padding--horizontal-none%40medium%22%3eOur+final+speaker+was+%3ca+href%3d%22https%3a%2f%2ftwitter.com%2fchineseroom%22%3eDan+Pinchbeck%3c%2fa%3e%2c+Creative+Director+at+The+Chinese+Room.+Dan+delievered+an+extremely+informative+and+powerful+talk+highlighting+some+key+lessons+learned+from+this+long+tenure+within+the+games+industry.%3c%2fp%3e%0d%0a%3c%2fdiv%3e%0d%0a%3c%2fli%3e%0d%0a%3c%2ful%3e","exportableData":"","index":1,"elements":[],"isTemplated":false,"htmlId":"","htmlClass":"","htmlStyle":"","rule":""}],"isTemplated":false, some+lovely+new+folks+at+%3ca+href%3d%22https%3a%2f%2ftwitter.com%2fhashtag%2fRocketJump%3fsrc%3dhash%22%3e%23RocketJump%3c%2fa%3e+Brighton%3c%2fp%3e%0d%0a%26mdash%3b+Dave+Gabriel+(%40FuturLabQuality)+%3ca+href%3d%22https%3a%2f%2ftwitter.com%2fFuturLabQuality%2fstatus%2f669293258196021248%22%3eNovember+24%2c+2015%3c%2fa%3e%3c%2fblockquote%3e%0d%0a%3c%2fli%3e%0d%0a%3cli+class%3d%22list__item+padding--horizontal-large%40medium+margin--bottom-large%22%3e%0d%0a%3cblockquote+class%3d%22twitter-tweet%22+lang%3d%22en%22%3e%0d%0a%3cp+lang%3d%22en%22+dir%3d%22ltr%22%3eExcellent+evening+at+%3ca+href%3d%22https%3a%2f%2ftwitter.com%2frocketjumpevent%22%3e%40rocketjumpevent%3c%2fa%3e%2c+had+a+great+time!+So+much+kudos+to+everyone+involved+in+its+organisation%2c+look+forward+to+more+%3a)%3c%2fp%3e%0d%0a%26mdash%3b+Adam+Hay+(%40unusualcadence)+%3ca+href%3d%22https%3a%2f%2ftwitter.com%2funusualcadence%2fstatus%2f669320283761844226%22%3eNovember+25%2c+2015%3c%2fa%3e%3c%2fblockquote%3e%0d%0a%3c%2fli%3e%0d%0a%3cli+class%3d%22list__item+padding--horizontal-large%40medium+margin--bottom-large%22%3e%0d%0a%3cblockquote+class%3d%22twitter-tweet%22+lang%3d%22en%22%3e%0d%0a%3cp+lang%3d%22en%22+dir%3d%22ltr%22%3eAnd+%3ca+href%3d%22https%3a%2f%2ftwitter.com%2frocketjumpevent%22%3e%40rocketjumpevent%3c%2fa%3e+%3ca+href%3d%22https%3a%2f%2ftwitter.com%2fhashtag%2fBrighton%3fsrc%3dhash%22%3e%23Brighton%3c%2fa%3e+is+a+wrap%2c+the+VR+kit+is+packed+away+for+another+day.+Great+talks%2c+always+fun+to+meet+new+%26amp%3b+old+faces+alike%3c%2fp%3e%0d%0a%26mdash%3b+Sam+Watts+(%40vr_sam)+%3ca+href%3d%22https%3a%2f%2ftwitter.com%2fvr_sam%2fstatus%2f669296677191294976%22%3eNovember+24%2c+2015%3c%2fa%3e%3c%2fblockquote%3e%0d%0a%3c%2fli%3e%0d%0a%3cli+class%3d%22list__item+padding--horizontal-large%40medium+margin--bottom-large%22%3e%0d%0a%3cblockquote+class%3d%22twitter-tweet%22+lang%3d%22en%22%3e%0d%0a%3cp+lang%3d%22en%22+dir%3d%22ltr%22%3ePhew+what+a+successful+event%2c+thanks+%3ca+href%3d%22https%3a%2f%2ftwitter.com%2frocketjumpevent%22%3e%40rocketjumpevent%3c%2fa%3e+%3ca+href%3d%22https%3a%2f%2ftwitter.com%2fhashtag%2fBrighton%3fsrc%3dhash%22%3e%23Brighton%3c%2fa%3e.+More+VR+converts%2c+great+talks+%26amp%3b+networking+was+done.+Now+%5bmore%5d+beer+%26amp%3b+bed%3c%2fp%3e%0d%0a%26mdash%3b+Tammeka+Games+(%40TammekaGaming)+%3ca+href%3d%22https%3a%2f%2ftwitter.com%2fTammekaGaming%2fstatus%2f669297766829527041%22%3eNovember+24%2c+2015%3c%2fa%3e%3c%2fblockquote%3e%0d%0a%3c%2fli%3e%0d%0a%3c%2ful%3e%0d%0a%3cscript+src%3d%22%2f%2fplatform.twitter.com%2fwidgets.js%22%3e%3c%2fscript%3e","exportableData":"","index":1,"elements":[],"isTemplated":false,"htmlId":"","htmlClass":"","htmlStyle":"","rule":""}],"isTemplated":false,"htmlId":"","htmlClass":"section--xx-wide
